Text: Hey thanks a lot for this upload. Been hoping someone would for a while now. I'll be sure to seed.
Hey, thanks Marsbui! Glad I could help. Please be sure to +1 the quality if you found it to be deserving.
It's english dubbed? HELL YES, Finally! Thanks dude!
I'll seed as soon as I finish the download. Maybe a few days or weeks?
